data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Pachuca pushes forward through Victor Davila, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 1, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Erick Aguirre (Pachuca) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Pablo Gonzalez Diaz is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Puebla in their own half.
Pablo Gonzalez Diaz for Puebla is back on the field again.
Throw-in for Puebla at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
In the minute 6, Pachuca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Pachuca.
Pachuca drive upfield and Emmanuel Garcia gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Puebla defender.
In the minute 9, Puebla have a goal kick.
Roberto de la Rosa of Pachuca smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Puebla to take a throw-in in Pachuca territory.
In the minute 12, Pachuca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Puebla drives forward and Jesus Paganoni gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Pachuca in the half of Puebla.
In the minute 12, Can Puebla get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pachuca's half?
In Puebla a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Puebla in their own half.
In the minute 20, Ball safe as Puebla is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Puebla's Brayan Angulo misses with an attempt on goal.
Throw-in Pachuca.
In the minute 26, Goal kick for Puebla at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
Free kick Puebla.
Throw-in Pachuca.
In the minute 29, Puebla are pushing forward but Omar Fernandez's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Pachuca goal kick.
Free kick for Pachuca in the half of Puebla.
In the minute 31, Puebla awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Pachuca in the half of Puebla.
Pachuca to take a throw-in in Puebla territory.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Puebla in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick Pachuca.
In the minute 35, Free kick for Pachuca in their own half.
Pachuca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Luis Chavez of Pachuca gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 38, It's a goal kick for the home team in Puebla.
Pachuca takes a corner from the right.
Puebla awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 42, Can Pachuca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Puebla's half?
Free kick for Pachuca in their own half.
Pachuca awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Pachuca in the half of Puebla.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
In Puebla a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The home team replace Jesus Paganoni with Alan Acosta.
Maximiliano Araujo is replacing Amaury Escoto for the home team.
In the minute 46, Roberto Nurse is on a sub for Roberto de la Rosa for Pachuca.
Puebla to take a throw-in in Pachuca territory.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Puebla in the half of Pachuca.
Ball safe as Pachuca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Pachuca in their own half.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Puebla at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
Pachuca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Puebla.
In the minute 53, Santiago Ormeno (Puebla) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Throw-in for Pachuca at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
Santiago Ormeno is booked for the home team.
In the minute 55, Free kick for Pachuca in the half of Puebla.
Can Pachuca capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Puebla's half?
Throw-in for Pachuca close to the penalty box.
In the minute 57, Goal kick for Puebla at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
Can Puebla get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pachuca's half?
Throw-in for Pachuca in their own half.
Ball safe as Pachuca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 59, Pachuca make their second substitution with Victor Sosa replacing Victor Davila.
Pachuca have been awarded a penalty...
In the minute 61, Goal! Victor Sosa gives Pachuca the lead from the penalty spot. The score is now 0-1.
Free kick Puebla.
Pachuca needs to be cautious. Puebla have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 65, Pachuca have a goal kick.
Puebla takes a corner from the right.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 67, Ball goes out of play for a Pachuca goal kick.
Eduardo Herrera is on a sub for Santiago Ormeno for Puebla.
Puebla make their fourth substitution with Bernardo Cuesta replacing Nestor Vicente Vidrio.
In the minute 71, Puebla awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Pachuca in the half of Puebla.
In Puebla a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 74, Rodrigo Salinas Dorantes (Pachuca) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Free kick for Pachuca in their own half.
Throw-in Pachuca.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Puebla a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 78, Cristian Souza is replacing Rodrigo Salinas Dorantes for the away team.
In the minute 79, Throw-in for Pachuca at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Puebla.
Can Puebla get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pachuca's half?
In the minute 83, Puebla are coming forward and Eduardo Herrera gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Pachuca have a goal kick.
Pachuca awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 85, The home team replace Brayan Angulo with Daniel Alvarez.
Goal kick for Pachuca at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
Pachuca to take a throw-in in Puebla territory.
In the minute 88, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Puebla close to the penalty box.
The away team replace Erick Sanchez with Efrain Orona.
Pachuca make their fifth substitution with Miguel Herrera replacing Luis Chavez.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Puebla.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Pachuca takes a corner from the right.
Puebla awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Puebla will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Pachuca.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-1.
